about_the_game:
Step into the world of Warbound, a turret defense game where strategy meets evolution. Battle across dynamic landscapes and eras, transitioning from medieval skirmishes against skeleton armies to futuristic clashes with advanced tech.

Key Features:

  • Evolve Through Time: Start with swords and shields and advance to lasers and drones as you adapt to shifting battlefronts.

  • Command & Conquer: Strategically place defenses, upgrade your arsenal, and outmaneuver cunning foes.

  • Immersive Art Style: Vibrant cel-shaded visuals bring rich, evolving battlegrounds to life.

  • Fast-Paced Action: Balance between tactical decision-making and the chaos of combat.


    Upgrade your home base, Add turrets, capture emplacements to build your defenses.

Master the art of adaptation and claim victory in an ever-changing battlefield. Whether you're defending crumbling ruins or harnessing futuristic power, every decision brings you closer to conquering the ages.

short_description: Warbound is a management auto battler where you battle through the ages and conquer your enemies in this modern take on a lost subgenre. Become a Strategic Master and dominate your enemy as you battle from the Stone Age and skeleton wars. Adapt, Upgrade, Win.
